name: Get Your Shit Together
description:
Enter Full Screen if its buggy on web or download the Windows game file

Escape a wicked lab filled with evil tacos as you leave no toilet unclogged in this bizarre adventure!
Get Your Shit Together is a 2-day fever dream we developed for GMTK 2020, and we really hope you have a great time with it. The theme's "Out of Control", so the only sane option was... yes, shitting oneself.

Play The Game In Full Screen.

Even The Music and Art is shit. Oh Wait that's just what the game is.

-Thrilling last-gen graphics!
-A catchy OST that will stick to you like... what's something sticky?
-Over 4 exactly identical enemy types!
-Incredibly fast-paced walking
-Easy to grasp controls that change every 5 seconds!
-Accurate facial expressions!
-And more than 300 pixels on-screen!

Developing this brown diamond was a blast, and gosh we reaaaally hope we didn't went overboard with the poop thing.
